oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red ink.

According to colophon (f. 28r), copy completed on 29 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1219 AH [March 35, 1805 AD] in the hand of Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm ibn al-Sayyid ʻUbayd ibn al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm ibn al-Sayyid Ḥasan ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻAlī al-Munayyir.
MS Arab 344. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
